Title: Feeding the Beast
Description:
I must join the Klaxxi Council and the other paragons immediately, but I am barely strong enough to stand.

I must feed, Wakener.

I sense the beating hearts of creatures on the northern bank of the lake.

Kill them for me, and I shall do the rest.
CompletionText: I have been sleeping for many thousands of years. I must regain my strength before rejoining the Council.
RewardText: I feel the strength returning to my body.
